items.name: Lime, Basil and Mandarin
items.description: An enticing, mouthwatering medley of Sicilian lime and zesty bergamot with a juicy heart busting with ripe mandarins, aquatic white florals, peppery basil and caraway seeds. Base notes include soft, velvety patchouli and sharp green vetivert.

items.name: Rhubarb and Custard
items.description: Identical to those red & yellow sweets we all loved as kids. Packed full of sweet vanilla aromas.

items.name: Lavender
items.description: Identical to freshly picked lavender flowers. This fragrance is bursting with floral aroma, this scent is just like walking through a lavender field in the heart of summer.

items.name: Roses
items.description: A freshly picked bouquet of roses in full bloom with nuances of geranium and violet, allÂ wrapped in a gentle woody base.
